link.title: SwiftUI - Fixed vs Dynamic Size Spacer

entry.summary:
A spacer is an element that adds space between two components. If it is inside a stack layout then it expands along the stack axis else expands in both directions.
Fixed Size Spacer Spacer is also a SwiftUI component and behaves similarly, So apply a frame modifier to set the height or width of Spacer.
